aware.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: if you are aware that a situation exists, you realize or know that it exists
aware.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Mr Braley has been made aware of the need for absolute secrecy.
As you are aware, a fee will be charged annually.
They were well aware that the company was losing money.
The children are aware of the danger of taking drugs.

aware.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: if you are aware of something, you notice it, especially because you can see, hear, feel, or smell it
aware.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: She was aware of a tall dark figure watching her.
He was aware of the wind in his face.
Bill became aware that he was still holding his glass.
aware.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: understanding a lot about what is happening around you and paying attention to it, especially because you realize possible dangers and problems
aware.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: the socially aware novels of Dickens
